original_text:
Dragon Shard
La mitologia e le creature fantastiche sono uno dei temi più utilizzati da sempre nel mondo delle slot machine. Creature come la Fenice, che rappresenta la rinascita, o i folletti che rappresentano la fortuna si sposano benissimo con l’inattesa vincita che una slot machine può portare con sé.
Per questo motivo non sorprende vedere l’utilizzo dei draghi nella slot machine Dragon Shard della Microgaming. I draghi da sempre rappresentano la ricchezza, sia nella cultura occidentale dove si nutrono di oro, sia in quella orientale dove fanno la guardia a immensi tesori.
Ecco quindi l’aria che si respira in questa slot, sin dal suo primo avvio.
Dragon Shard: l’aspetto visivo
Da un punto di vista prettamente estetico, Dragon Shard della Microgaming mostra uno scenario tra l’incontaminato e il fantastico: la griglia di gioco con le sue particolarità (di cui parleremo nel prossimo punto di questa recensione) è incastonata in una valle ricca di acqua, alberi ed erba. In questo scenario troviamo delle costruzioni che richiamano dei templi, forse alludendo alla natura divina di queste bestie sputafuoco.
All’interno della schermata, i classici simboli delle carte da gioco (A, K, Q, J…) sono scomparsi, forse per non cozzare con il tema fantasy della slot, e sono stati sostituiti dai loro semi (picche, denari, fiori e cuori). Questi sembrano delle gemme preziose che si combinano bene con le altre immagini che appaiono nella schermata di gioco.
Dragon Shard: meccaniche di gioco
Spostandoci sull’aspetto tecnico, che tanto interessa un potenziale giocatore, la slot si discosta dagli standard importi dalle slot online, abbandonando il meccanismo 5×3 e sfruttando invece un 5×5.
Il rettangolo di gioco diventa così un quadrato in grado di contenere ben 25 simboli a ogni giocata, cosa che di fatto aumenta la possibilità di utilizzare un numero maggiore di linee di vincita e di ottenere un rosa più ampia di combinazioni.
Tra i vari simboli da tenere d’occhio durante il gioco, troviamo il titolo stesso della slot, Dragon Shard, che in questo caso ricopre il ruolo di simbolo Wild, un jolly in grado di sostituire tutti gli altri simboli in gioco.
Un altro simbolo dotato di funzione speciale è l’occhio del drago (non della tigre, mi raccomando) che permette di accedere alla funzione relativa ai giri gratuiti.
Esistono delle novità che permettono di avere un gioco sempre innovativo: talvolta i simboli appaiono nascosti dietro un punto interrogativo, che poi li svelerà come tutti dello stesso tipo (ottimo per ottenere delle combinazioni).
I simboli possono apparire in lunghezza e coprire più di uno spazio alla volta, in particolare quelli che raffigurano i vari personaggi e che permettono di ottenere delle combinazioni di alto valore.
Slot simili a Dragon Shard
Come abbiamo avuto modo di dire in precedenza esiste un grande numero di slot machine che utilizza i draghi al proprio interno. Se Dragon Shard della Microgaming offre un’immagine occidentale della figura dei draghi, a riprendere lo stile cinese troviamo la Pragmatic Play con la slot Triple Dragons.
Sempre della stessa casa e sempre relativa all’immagine cinese dei draghi, troviamo 8 Dragons, che mostra anche altre creature del folklore e della cultura orientale al suo interno.

raw_translation.response:
Dragon Shard

Myths and fantastic creatures have always been a popular theme in the world of slot games. The Phoenix, symbolizing rebirth, and the luck-bringing fairies fit perfectly with the unexpected winnings that a slot machine can bring. That's why it's not surprising to see the use of dragons in Microgaming's Dragon Shard slot. Dragons have always symbolized wealth, both in Western culture where they hoard gold, and in Eastern culture where they guard immense treasures. 

From the moment you start playing, Dragon Shard immerses you into a world of untouched beauty and fantasy. The game grid, with all of its unique features (which we'll discuss in the next point of this review), is set in a valley full of water, trees, and grass. You'll also find structures that resemble temples, perhaps alluding to the divine nature of these fire-breathing beasts.

The classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q, J...) have been replaced by their suits (spades, diamonds, clubs and hearts), which resemble precious gems and blend well with the other images in the game.

Moving on to the technical aspects that interest the experienced gambler, this slot deviates from the standard 5x3 mechanism of many online slots and instead uses a 5x5 structure. This rectangular game screen becomes a square that can contain up to 25 symbols per spin, increasing the possibility of using multiple winning lines and obtaining a wider range of winning combinations.

Throughout the game, keep an eye out for the Dragon Shard symbol itself, which acts as the game's Wild symbol, substituting for all other symbols. Another notable symbol is the Dragon's Eye, which triggers the free spin feature.

Innovation is key in this game: symbols can sometimes be hidden behind a question mark, and then revealed to all be the same (great for obtaining combinations). Symbols can also cover multiple spaces, especially those depicting various characters and which lead to high-value combinations.

If you're a fan of dragon-themed slots, other games like Triple Dragons and 8 Dragons, both from Pragmatic Play, offer a unique eastern take on dragon mythology.

Dragon Shard

Myths and fantastic creatures have always been a popular theme in the world of slot games. The Phoenix, symbolizing rebirth, and the luck-bringing fairies fit perfectly with the unexpected winnings that a slot machine can bring. That's why it's not surprising to see the use of dragons in Microgaming's Dragon Shard slot. Dragons have always symbolized wealth, both in Western culture where they hoard gold, and in Eastern culture where they guard immense treasures. 

From the moment you start playing, Dragon Shard immerses you into a world of untouched beauty and fantasy. The game grid, with all of its unique features (which we'll discuss in the next point of this review), is set in a valley full of water, trees, and grass. You'll also find structures that resemble temples, perhaps alluding to the divine nature of these fire-breathing beasts.

The classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q, J...) have been replaced by their suits (spades, diamonds, clubs and hearts), which resemble precious gems and blend well with the other images in the game.

Moving on to the technical aspects that interest the experienced gambler, this slot deviates from the standard 5x3 mechanism of many online slots and instead uses a 5x5 structure. This rectangular game screen becomes a square that can contain up to 25 symbols per spin, increasing the possibility of using multiple winning lines and obtaining a wider range of winning combinations.

Throughout the game, keep an eye out for the Dragon Shard symbol itself, which acts as the game's Wild symbol, substituting for all other symbols. Another notable symbol is the Dragon's Eye, which triggers the free spin feature.

Innovation is key in this game: symbols can sometimes be hidden behind a question mark, and then revealed to all be the same (great for obtaining combinations). Symbols can also cover multiple spaces, especially those depicting various characters and which lead to high-value combinations.

raw_translation.response:
Dragon Shard:
Mythology and fantastic creatures have always been one of the most utilized themes in the world of slot machines. From the Phoenix, representing rebirth, to the mischievous leprechauns representing good fortune, they all complement the unexpected win that a slot machine can bring. It is for this reason that the use of dragons in Microgaming's Dragon Shard slot machine does not come as a surprise. Dragons have always represented wealth, both in Western cultures where they hoard gold and in the Eastern cultures where they guard immense treasures.

From the moment you launch the game, you are immersed in an environment that is both pure and fantastic. The game board is set in a valley rich in water, trees, and grass, surrounded by structures that resemble temples, perhaps alluding to the divine nature of these fire-breathing beasts. The classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q, J...) have been replaced by their respective suits (spades, diamonds, clubs, and hearts), resembling precious gems that blend well with the other images that appear on the game screen.

In terms of technical aspects, which are of great interest to any potential player, the slot deviates from the standard 5x3 mechanism of online slots and instead, utilizes a 5x5 reel format. The rectangular game board is thus transformed into a square, capable of accommodating 25 symbols per play, which effectively increases the possibility of using a greater number of pay lines and obtaining a wider range of combinations.

Throughout the game, players should keep an eye out for the game's title itself, Dragon Shard, which serves as the Wild symbol, capable of replacing all other symbols on the game board. Another important symbol is the dragon's eye which grants access to the free spin function.

Dragon Shard offers several innovations that ensure players are always engaged and utterly captivated. Symbols occasionally appear hidden behind question marks, which, when revealed, turn out to be all of the same type– an excellent way of obtaining winning combinations. The symbols can also appear in a stretched format which covers more than one reel, particularly those that depict the various characters, and offer high-value combinations.

For those intrigued by dragon-themed slots, similar to Dragon Shard, there are a great number of alternatives available. While Microgaming's Dragon Shard presents a Western perspective of the winged creatures, Pragmatic Play's Triple Dragons utilizes the iconic symbols of Chinese culture. Another Microgaming slot, 8 Dragons, also showcases a host of creatures from Chinese folklore and culture.

message.content:
Dragon Shard:
Mythology and fantastic creatures have always been one of the most utilized themes in the world of slot machines. From the Phoenix, representing rebirth, to the mischievous leprechauns representing good fortune, they all complement the unexpected win that a slot machine can bring. It is for this reason that the use of dragons in Microgaming's Dragon Shard slot machine does not come as a surprise. Dragons have always represented wealth, both in Western cultures where they hoard gold and in the Eastern cultures where they guard immense treasures.

From the moment you launch the game, you are immersed in an environment that is both pure and fantastic. The game board is set in a valley rich in water, trees, and grass, surrounded by structures that resemble temples, perhaps alluding to the divine nature of these fire-breathing beasts. The classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q, J...) have been replaced by their respective suits (spades, diamonds, clubs, and hearts), resembling precious gems that blend well with the other images that appear on the game screen.

In terms of technical aspects, which are of great interest to any potential player, the slot deviates from the standard 5x3 mechanism of online slots and instead, utilizes a 5x5 reel format. The rectangular game board is thus transformed into a square, capable of accommodating 25 symbols per play, which effectively increases the possibility of using a greater number of pay lines and obtaining a wider range of combinations.

Throughout the game, players should keep an eye out for the game's title itself, Dragon Shard, which serves as the Wild symbol, capable of replacing all other symbols on the game board. Another important symbol is the dragon's eye which grants access to the free spin function.

Dragon Shard offers several innovations that ensure players are always engaged and utterly captivated. Symbols occasionally appear hidden behind question marks, which, when revealed, turn out to be all of the same type– an excellent way of obtaining winning combinations. The symbols can also appear in a stretched format which covers more than one reel, particularly those that depict the various characters, and offer high-value combinations.

For those intrigued by dragon-themed slots, similar to Dragon Shard, there are a great number of alternatives available. While Microgaming's Dragon Shard presents a Western perspective of the winged creatures, Pragmatic Play's Triple Dragons utilizes the iconic symbols of Chinese culture. Another Microgaming slot, 8 Dragons, also showcases a host of creatures from Chinese folklore and culture.

Review: Dragon Shard:
Mythology and fantastic creatures have always been one of the most utilized themes in the world of slot machines. From the Phoenix, representing rebirth, to the mischievous leprechauns representing good fortune, they all complement the unexpected win that a slot machine can bring. It is for this reason that the use of dragons in Microgaming's Dragon Shard slot machine does not come as a surprise. Dragons have always represented wealth, both in Western cultures where they hoard gold and in the Eastern cultures where they guard immense treasures.

From the moment you launch the game, you are immersed in an environment that is both pure and fantastic. The game board is set in a valley rich in water, trees, and grass, surrounded by structures that resemble temples, perhaps alluding to the divine nature of these fire-breathing beasts. The classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q, J...) have been replaced by their respective suits (spades, diamonds, clubs, and hearts), resembling precious gems that blend well with the other images that appear on the game screen.

In terms of technical aspects, which are of great interest to any potential player, the slot deviates from the standard 5x3 mechanism of online slots and instead, utilizes a 5x5 reel format. The rectangular game board is thus transformed into a square, capable of accommodating 25 symbols per play, which effectively increases the possibility of using a greater number of pay lines and obtaining a wider range of combinations.

Throughout the game, players should keep an eye out for the game's title itself, Dragon Shard, which serves as the Wild symbol, capable of replacing all other symbols on the game board. Another important symbol is the dragon's eye which grants access to the free spin function.

Dragon Shard offers several innovations that ensure players are always engaged and utterly captivated. Symbols occasionally appear hidden behind question marks, which, when revealed, turn out to be all of the same type– an excellent way of obtaining winning combinations. The symbols can also appear in a stretched format which covers more than one reel, particularly those that depict the various characters, and offer high-value combinations.

For those intrigued by dragon-themed slots, similar to Dragon Shard, there are a great number of alternatives available. While Microgaming's Dragon Shard presents a Western perspective of the winged creatures, Pragmatic Play's Triple Dragons utilizes the iconic symbols of Chinese culture. Another Microgaming slot, 8 Dragons, also showcases a host of creatures from Chinese folklore and culture.

If you're a fan of slot games with a dragon theme similar to Dragon Shard, fear not! There are plenty of other games out there to satisfy your fire-breathing cravings. However, we think Dragon Shard sets itself apart from the pack in some meaningful ways.

First, Dragon Shard takes a Western perspective on dragons, which is a refreshing change from the more common Eastern take we see in other games. It's fun to see dragons represented in a new way, and the gorgeous graphics on display here make it all the more enjoyable.

If you're looking for other dragon-themed slots that incorporate Chinese culture, you might enjoy Pragmatic Play's Triple Dragons. This game features iconic Chinese symbols like golden dragons, red lanterns, and more for a truly immersive experience. And if you're a fan of Microgaming's offerings, they also have a slot called 8 Dragons that showcases creatures from Chinese folklore and culture.

Overall, while there are certainly other dragon-themed games out there, we think Dragon Shard stands out for its unique take on these mythical creatures and its stunning visuals. Give it a spin (or ten) and see for yourself!

Review: Dragon Shard:
Mythology and fantastic creatures have always been one of the most utilized themes in the world of slot machines. From the Phoenix, representing rebirth, to the mischievous leprechauns representing good fortune, they all complement the unexpected win that a slot machine can bring. It is for this reason that the use of dragons in Microgaming's Dragon Shard slot machine does not come as a surprise. Dragons have always represented wealth, both in Western cultures where they hoard gold and in the Eastern cultures where they guard immense treasures.

From the moment you launch the game, you are immersed in an environment that is both pure and fantastic. The game board is set in a valley rich in water, trees, and grass, surrounded by structures that resemble temples, perhaps alluding to the divine nature of these fire-breathing beasts. The classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q, J...) have been replaced by their respective suits (spades, diamonds, clubs, and hearts), resembling precious gems that blend well with the other images that appear on the game screen.

In terms of technical aspects, which are of great interest to any potential player, the slot deviates from the standard 5x3 mechanism of online slots and instead, utilizes a 5x5 reel format. The rectangular game board is thus transformed into a square, capable of accommodating 25 symbols per play, which effectively increases the possibility of using a greater number of pay lines and obtaining a wider range of combinations.

Throughout the game, players should keep an eye out for the game's title itself, Dragon Shard, which serves as the Wild symbol, capable of replacing all other symbols on the game board. Another important symbol is the dragon's eye which grants access to the free spin function.

Dragon Shard offers several innovations that ensure players are always engaged and utterly captivated. Symbols occasionally appear hidden behind question marks, which, when revealed, turn out to be all of the same type– an excellent way of obtaining winning combinations. The symbols can also appear in a stretched format which covers more than one reel, particularly those that depict the various characters, and offer high-value combinations.

For those intrigued by dragon-themed slots, similar to Dragon Shard, there are a great number of alternatives available. While Microgaming's Dragon Shard presents a Western perspective of the winged creatures, Pragmatic Play's Triple Dragons utilizes the iconic symbols of Chinese culture. Another Microgaming slot, 8 Dragons, also showcases a host of creatures from Chinese folklore and culture.
